alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Spencer (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 4:18AM EDT until May 09 at 4:45AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Spencer County in central Kentucky... Shelby County in central Kentucky... * Until 445 AM EDT. * At 417 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Middletown to 6 miles southwest of Shelbyville to near Taylorsville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has had a history of producing large hail. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, Simpsonville, Montclair, Harrisonville, Hooper, Middletown Heights, Peytona, Clay Village, Finchville, and Conner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
